DOC.brief_summary: To determine MTD dose-limiting toxicity recombinant interleukin-2 ( aldesleukin ; Proleukin ) administer subcutaneously HIV-seropositive patient . To identify tolerable subcutaneous regimen replicate immunologic improvement demonstrate outpatient polyethylene glycolated IL-2 high-dose continuous infusion IL-2 study . To evaluate incidence level anti-IL-2 antibody formation subcutaneously administer Proleukin patient population .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase I Study Subcutaneously Administered Proleukin ( Aldesleukin ) HIV-Infected Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Patients receive subcutaneous Proleukin , MTD determine .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Patients must : Documented HIV infection ELISA Western blot . CD4 count > 200 cells/mm3 . Required : FDAapproved antiretroviral therapy least 2 month prior study entry .
